website_summaries.verdict: One of the larger alum block products you’ll find, so it should last a long time, even in a busy home.
pros: Ships inside a plastic case, which will prevent the corners and edges from cracking
Works perfectly after a shave to cool irritated skin and to close any minor nicks
Uses only pure potash alum with no added chemicals
Works nicely for men or women after shaving
cons: Plastic case may crack if it’s placed under stress

customer_reviews.title: The plastic box is TRASH
customer_reviews.text: I foolishly chose this particular alum block due to the name brand and the plastic travel case. Wow what a mistake! While the block seems just okay the plastic box is total trash. It is so thin and poorly made that I have no idea how it could ever survive shipment. Or how it could survive a Q-tip falling onto it - seriously it is so thin and poorly made I can almost guarantee that it will crack before it ever arrives at your address.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the block. It is larger than others and that is important because these bars are slippery when wet and if you drop it in the sink it will shatter and you’ll be buying another one. What I do for a better grip is wrap a rubber band in one end. This helps keep it from slipping out of your hands. The box is an ok plastic but the closing tabs on the lid look and feel a bit flimsy. I am afraid that with use they will snap off after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nelxon

customer_reviews.title: Great size bar
customer_reviews.text: Happy about the size, same size as a bath soap bar. Its easy to hold and should last a long time if i don't break it. It appears to be compressed large crystals and powder but it is holding together great so far. Stings a bit like my aftershave but really helpful to eliminate razor burn and minor nicks... The plastic case could be better quality... Happy 😊 with this product and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JohnMan33

customer_reviews.title: It slows or stops bleeding razor nicks
customer_reviews.text: This product works pretty much as expected. I use it when I nick myself shaving. It slows or stops bleeding razor nicks. In conjunction with the Alum Block I also use a Septic Stick which is another product used to stop bleeding shaver nicks. I use both of these together as sort of a one-two punch and any shaving razor nick bleeding has been stopped.
customer_reviews.author: JerryW

customer_reviews.title: Broken case  plus shattered block.
customer_reviews.text: Block came with a broken case and the block itself was broken with sharp edges. Not exactly what I need to rub on my face after a nice close shave. It is too much trouble to return and exchange. I will just order from somewhere else next time. The "travel case" is a joke. It can't even survive shipping without breaking apart.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: Great alum block; sub-par travel case.
customer_reviews.text: I give the block itself a five-star rating. I really like the way it treats small nicks and how it makes my face feel. The deduction is for the case that it comes in, which is 'brittle' plastic and didn't survive the shipment. This is partly due to the weight of the block itself which is fairly heavy. My guess is that as the block shifted during shipment, it cracked the case. The seller was very helpful in sending me a replacement case.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, just don't put it in the punch!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it feels on my face after a shave - it doesn't sting and feels nice and cool, without any interference from a scent. It should last forever. Just remember not to put it into the punch (See the 3 Stooges short "NO CENSUS, NO FEELING" for what I mean....)
customer_reviews.author: Knucklehead

customer_reviews.title: Large and Easy to Hold
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and largest alum bar I’ve found. Because it’s larger, I haven’t dropped it once. Because I haven’t dropped it, it hasn’t shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Tyson

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: does the job good alum block for a reasonable price like the size - easier to hold would definitely buy again i have been using alum blocks for 5+ years and have been wet shaving for 55+ years
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second bar of this product. It works great and lasts a long time. It seems to be a decent size. The case is more than adequate. Remember, if you want a better case, you're gonna pay more money. I'll be ordering more of this in the future!
customer_reviews.author: El Dooderino

customer_reviews.title: Put your favorite aftershave on and your done
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is, it does what it says its going to do. Follow the directions on the bar. I have used it and it works wonders. I am not going to lie here it does sting when you use it but if you have any knicks it will stop the bleeding. Your face feels refreshed and clean. Put your favorite aftershave on and your done. Love the product and I will get it again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. Shipped quickly. Works well for intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: mt1968

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Buy this and save $. Better and way cheaper than septic sticks...works better!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome alum block at a good price. I paid considerably more for one from a very well known specialty shaving store, and so far, the Parker stone is working just as well. The plastic case is a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Julian M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best post-shave product I have used. Seals up nicks and reduces irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Eastern Hound

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty alum block!
customer_reviews.text: This is one BIG alum block. It's huge. I have a feeling it will take me years to finish it. Other than the size, it's also really good at stopping bleeding quickly and it does not leave a lot of salty residue. I do recommend washing the face after applying it, but if you like leaving alum on, it's not gonna leave white grainy surface like the Osma Block does.
customer_reviews.author: KaBuKiM

customer_reviews.title: good quality bar bad storage box
customer_reviews.text: good bar don’t like the storage box will wear out long before the product. that’s why i gave it a four star. at this price point should include a better storage container
customer_reviews.author: tH

customer_reviews.title: I love the large size of the stone
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery, Item as described. I love the large size of the stone, easy to handle & prevents me from dropping it while using. However, customer service is impeccable, Very satisfied & will buy from this seller more products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized alum block
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized alum block. Cut like a bar of soap from a pan - one side is silky smooth but the other is a bit rough.
customer_reviews.author: philsummit

customer_reviews.title: I like the container
customer_reviews.text: That's the actual size, great sturdy container, can't understand why some reviews said it's not good
customer_reviews.author: Morenita 4733

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: This product is used after shaving to tighten the skin and stop minor bleeding from cuts and nicks. It does what it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: RayClem

customer_reviews.title: Broken travel case
customer_reviews.text: The plastic case was the primary reason I chose this product over others. The case arrived with the corner broken. I was going to use this for travel.....
customer_reviews.author: robert hereford

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product accurate description I do recommend this project over store bought products no sharp stinks like alcohol-based aftershave and don't dry out the skin I use it on both my head and face
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I think that's where the soap went!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find Large blocks that are less dispossessed to flying out of your hand like a budget-hotel bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Morris Fishbine

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Block came in time. Nice size. Comfortable fit in hand. Ordered an inexpensive tallow based soap- Williams Mug Soap- and the combo was amazing. I'll use the Alum Bar after every shave with my various soaps and creams. Highly recommend this high quality alum bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It tightens my skin after I shave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small detail lowered my rating Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this. Great product. Would give better rating if the Plastic container hadn't broke.Will order again when necessary and will be more careful with the storage container.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: ... my friend let me try it and it works great. Just be sure to follow the care instructions
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first but my friend let me try it and it works great. Just be sure to follow the care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: David Tulchinsky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. New to DE shaving and never knew ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. New to DE shaving and never knew about this product. Works great! Great service from Super Safety Razors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Only Alum Block You Need
customer_reviews.text: This is the first alum block I've ever gotten and I like it a lot. After shaving, I wet the block in cold water and just rub it over my face. It gives the same kind of burn as alcohol-based aftershave but seems to tighten up the skin afterwards. It also stops bleeding much faster than aftershave from what I've noticed. After my skin dries, I just rub my face back over with cold water and apply some after-shave balm. This yields great results. I'm pleased with this product and I'm sure this block will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not a solid block
customer_reviews.text: The item description and other reviews lead me to believe that this was a solid alum block but it is actually several smaller pieces pressed together. There is a large empty cavity inside, flecks of black grit embedded inside and there is some sort patchy of yellow deposit. It was dirty on the outside and cleaning it only highlighted the inner defects. The plastic case was shattered on arrival; the plastic is very thin and brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Eisenhart

customer_reviews.title: Nice Alum Block
customer_reviews.text: I'm a wet shaving noob and this is my first alum block. After watching several wet shaving videos, I highly recommend alum blocks for wet shaving noobs. I would also like to share a tip I saw on a video - which is to wrap a thick rubber band around the block. This will give you better grip and decrease the chance of you dropping and/or destroying the block.
customer_reviews.author: 3athlt

customer_reviews.title: Love the size not the shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This new alum block showed up right before i decided to try out my bew ikon DE razor. Tbis is alum and works just like it should very good size and easy to hold. Only prob is the case and block took a beating in shipping or before its hard to say the case is messed up and the block was a little worse for wear. All in all good product and the size is perfect. Shipping and packaging not so much.
customer_reviews.author: michael j archer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The second and third shaves are usually nick free, but no matter how careful I am during the first shave with a new blade there will almost always be a nick or two. Nicks or not, I always wet this and rub it over the entire surfaced just shaved. It stops bleeding and tightens my face. A few minutes later I washed it off and follow up with aftershave lotion and balm from Proraso (green).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Harden

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Use it after shaving, no complaints. Had it for several months now. Worn down just a bit but still going. Came as an intact block in a plastic case. I don’t find it so slippery as to need to add rubber bands like I read some reviewers do. I just wet the end with cold water and pass it over my shaved face. Works wonders with small cuts and you can feel your skin tighten. No residue and no odor.
customer_reviews.author: comfortable dave

customer_reviews.title: Favorite album block so far
customer_reviews.text: So much smoother than the cheaper brand that comes with plastic case. The case is thin plastic but the actual bar is of nice size and very smooth. I've only ever used gentleman Jack but this is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works! Helps prevent irritation and razor ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! Helps prevent irritation and razor burn. Even stops the bleeding on very small cuts and nicks. I give the product 5 stars, but the case it comes with gets about 2 stars. The case seems to be rather flimsy and I can see the block greatly outlasting the case, as its a rather large block. So in total, I give it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Pauliec

customer_reviews.title: Came with broken cover box
customer_reviews.text: Well it arrived but the plastic cover box is broken which was meant to protect and place it, now that I’ve no place to keep it, it looks weird and makes the area messy. Wish they had a better quality cover box.
customer_reviews.author: Kuldeep Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Firms the skin instantly. Not much of a sting compared to pencil. I use it after almost ever shave prior to aftershave feels good. Loves the plastic box so I can keep it dry
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Came broken in half. I was trying to replace my old one that broke in half.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I give this item a 5 star rating simply because ...
customer_reviews.text: I give this item a 5 star rating simply because it is what it is, does what I believe it's supposed to, and arrived within the estimated window of delivery. As a novice to wet shaving, I have no former experience on which to base a comparison. I will say this... avoid getting any of this stuff in your mouth. I don't think it's particularly harmful (unless you eat the whole thing, if that's how you roll), but the taste is unpleasant (which is an understatement, it's profoundly unsettling in the yuck factor).
customer_reviews.author: Justin Summersell

customer_reviews.title: DON'T FIX WHAT ISN'T BROKEN.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE PERFECT AFTERSHAVE PRODUCT. WORKS FOR ANY SKIN TYPE. IT'S BEEN AROUND SINCE ANCIENT EGYPT. THIS SIZE BLOCK WILL LAST MONTHS AND MONTHS. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON SILLY PRODUCTS OFF THE SHELF, THIS STUFF ACTUALLY WORKS AND WILL CHANGE YOUR WET SHAVING EXPERIENCE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gene Arlook

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken but functional!
customer_reviews.text: its an okay product, the alum block was broken. and the storage was broken as well, other than that its ok.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: A simple , but staple to have in your shave routine. It seals and tightens after a close shave. Smooths the face, wait like 30 seconds, rinse off.follow with a after shave splash and or balm. You'll wonder why you did without it.
customer_reviews.author: Rmaggi3019

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Covers the shaved areas quickly based on its size good travel case it should last me 18 months this was a good purchase for me
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Simply superb...
customer_reviews.text: Constantly nicking meself while shaving, so I purchased 2 of these blocks. Been a year almost, and still firmly on 1st bar. Ever soooo GLAD...
customer_reviews.author: Rugged One

customer_reviews.title: The One
customer_reviews.text: It's your deodorant, your aftershave, you athletes foot treatment, acne reducer, etc, etc. I think everyone should have one in their home.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bar of soap size
customer_reviews.text: It's an alum block. Does it's job as alum should. Be prepared for that sting!!! I love it. Plastic travel case is nice, tho mine was broke. It's all good tho.
customer_reviews.author: James Powell

customer_reviews.title: Parker Safety Razor's Large Alum Block with Travel Case
customer_reviews.text: I shave much faster and recklessly now with this stuff. LOL
customer_reviews.author: fox

customer_reviews.title: I ONLY FOUND ONE PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good but the edges are very sharp and cut the skin, you have to constantly be sanding them, I use it as deodorant, unfortunately it is sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Luna

customer_reviews.title: Big Block makes for Quick Application!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to take a chance on the Parker alum block as my Osma block had recently run out. Received the product quickly and there is no comparison – Parker is Great! The block size is significantly larger, and makes it much easier to cover my face very quickly. Fantastic service – thanks again Howie!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Cracked case and hair inside!!
customer_reviews.text: I SPECIFICALLY chose this alum block because it came with a travel case. The case is cracked and there’s hair inside...disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: Keah Sorrells

customer_reviews.title: My first Alum Block
customer_reviews.text: I am brand-new wet shaving and this is my first alum block. I used to to give me a better grip on my razor during my shave and it felt good during the post shave . I would've given it five stars but it has a crack in it and I'm questioning how long it will hold together .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and packaged
customer_reviews.text: Works good: will last a long long time even with daily use
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Moye

customer_reviews.title: Good alum block is good. What a surprise.
customer_reviews.text: It's large, and it's polished well to work. Nothing else really needs to be said about this; it's an alum block.
customer_reviews.author: AJ H.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This is like a sold crystal to people who never used it. This is my first time using it and it does help with cuts and keeps them from getting infected if you do a hard job at shaving. There is a little sting but nothing to say ouch over just another point to someone new to this. It works like it says and stops bleeding from small cuts. Alum should not be consumed since there is a possible link to cancer but i figure for my skin it should be okay. This is my first time trying to jump on the saftey razor wagon and a coworker said i should get this. I am NOT disappointed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: it's nice to get more bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using the RazoRock alum block, so maybe I'm a bit biased, but I think this alum block is simply too big. Sure, it's nice to get more bang for your buck, but applying the alum is cumbersome and awkward when compared to the nice, compact size of the RazoRock. And considering *all* alum blocks last an eternity (or at least until you drop it), I don't think bigger is necessarily better, so I won't be purchasing this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Terry

customer_reviews.title: Try it, I never shave without it now...
customer_reviews.text: Another shaving item I only recently learned about. Indispensable for calming your face after a close shave. Oftentimes, I don't even have to go to a styptic pencil for small nicks. The irritated shaved area is calmed immediately and the skin feels tighter after you rinse with cold water. Don't know how I got along without this... Items like this alleviate the discomfort and bother of shaving and help make it a pleasurable experience, instead.
customer_reviews.author: George Holbert

customer_reviews.title: and definitely like how it helps after a shave
customer_reviews.text: This is a new item for me to use. I've had it for a few weeks, and definitely like how it helps after a shave. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lusco

product_meta.title: Parker Safety Razor's Large Alum Block with Travel Case (125 g / 4.4 oz.) - A Natural Aftershave with Antiseptic Properties
product_meta.description: Not all alum blocks are created equal. Our Parker Alum Block is made from the highest and purest natural Potash Alum. Many less expensive bars are from chemically derived components. This alum block is superior as an aftershave treatment with antiseptic properties. To use, simply wet the bar in cold water and rub the bar against your skin. Wait 30 seconds or so, and then rinse. You will feel the antiseptic in action. This bar is great for treating minor shaving cuts and nicks as well.
feature_bullets: A natural antiseptic which also opens pores and treats shaving nicks
First used by Egyptians over 4000 years ago
Made from 100% pure natural potash alum
Large 125 Gram/4 oz. stone will last for years
Packaged in a plastic storage case

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
